CardDesc.Tyrant: You **must** kill a warband _(even your own)_ at the site you travel to, if able.

CardDesc.Cursed Cauldron: If you're victorious, gain one warband per enemy warband killed in this campaign.

CardDesc.Conspiracy: _If drawn from the world deck, increase Visions Drawn. **Anyone** can play his face up._ **When Played**: You may burn `symbol:secret` to take one relic or banner from a player whose pawn is at your site. If it's a banner, it burns `symbol:favor` `symbol:favor` / `symbol:secret` `symbol:secret`. To do so, you **must** have at least two advisers whose suits match any of their adviers. Return this card to the box.

CardDesc.Vision of Rebellion: _If drawn from the world deck, increase Visions Drawn. **Exiles** can play this face up on their Revealed Vision space._ **Wake**: You win if you hold the People's Favor and at least three visions have been drawn from the deck.
CardDesc.Vision of Sanctuary: _If drawn from the world deck, increase Visions Drawn. **Exiles** can play this face up on their Revealed Vision space._ **Wake**: You win if you hold the most relics and banners, and at least three visions have been drawn from the deck.
CardDesc.Vision of Conquest: _If drawn from the world deck, increase Visions Drawn. **Exiles** can play this face up on their Revealed Vision space._ **Wake**: You win if you rule the most sites and at least three visions have been drawn from the deck.
CardDesc.Ancient City: If you play an `suit:order` card to this site, and you have not discarded an `suit:order` card here during this turn, you get 2 warbands.
CardDesc.Barren Coast: When traveling from here to a Coast site, the Travel cost is 1 Supply and you **ignore** the Narrow Pass tower.
CardDesc.Buried Giant: When traveling from here, you may flip one secret on your board facedown to spend no Supply and **ignore** the Narrow Pass power. _(Facedown secrets cannot be used to pay a cost.)_
CardDesc.Charming Valley: When traveling from here, increase the Travel cost by 1 Supply. _(For example, traveling from the Provinces costs 3 Supply, not 2 Supply.)_
CardDesc.Deep Woods: If you play a `suit:beast` card to this site, and you have not discarded a `suit:beast` card here during this turn, you take the relic here, treating this as recovering it.
CardDesc.Drowned City: At the end of your Wake Phase, if your pawn is here, you may take one `symbol:secret` from this site.
CardDesc.Fertile Valley: If you play a `suit:heart` card to this site, and you have not discarded a `suit:hearth` card here during this turn, you get `symbol:favor`.
CardDesc.Great Slum: When playing or moving a card to this site, you may discard a card here first.
CardDesc.The Tribunal: **Action**: If you rule this site or your pawn is here, negotiate a binding exchange of `symbol:favor` and `symbol:secret` as well as binding actions at any future time, in any combination, with any player. _(Be as creative as you want with your agreement and your agreed-upon penalties if someone breaks it!)_
CardDesc.Lush Coast: When traveling from here to a Coast site, the Travel cost is 1 Supply and you **ignore** the Narrow Pass tower.
CardDesc.Marshes: When searching, you **must** draw one fewer card if your pawn is here.
CardDesc.Mine: At the end of your Wake Phase, if your pawn is here, you may take one `symbol:favor` from this site.
CardDesc.Mountain: You **must** subtract one `symbol:dicer` if you declare any number of targets at this site _(even if you rule)_.
CardDesc.Narrow Pass: When traveling from another region to this region, you **must** Travel to this site. When campaigning, if you declare any targets in this region and your pawn is in a different region, you **must** target this site unless you rule it.
CardDesc.Plains: You **must** add one `symbol:dicer` if you declare any number of targets at this site _(even if you rule)_.
CardDesc.River: When mustering from a card at this site, you gain one more warband if you rule this site.
CardDesc.Rocky Coast: When traveling from here to a Coast site, the Travel cost is 1 Supply and you **ignore** the Narrow Pass tower.
CardDesc.Salt Flats: At the end of your Wake Phase, if your pawn is here, you may take one `symbol:favor` or `symbol:secret` from this site.
CardDesc.Shrouded Wood: When traveling from here, the Travel cost is 2 Supply, and you **ignore** the Narrow Pass and The Hidden Place powers. If an enemy rules here, you travel to the site of the ruler's choice _(Chancellor's choice if ruled by the Empire)_, even if another player is making you travel.
CardDesc.Standing Stones: If you play an `suit:arcane` card to this site, and you have not discarded an `suit:arcane` card here during this turn, you get `symbol:secret`.
CardDesc.Steppe: If you play a `suit:nomad` card to this site, and you have not discarded a `suit:nomad` card here during this turn, you get `symbol:secret`.
CardDesc.The Hidden Place: You **cannot** travel to here or declare campaign targets here unless you flip one secret on your board facedown.
CardDesc.Wastes: If you play a `suit:discord` card to this site, and you have not discarded a `suit:discord` card here during this turn, you get take the relic here, treating this as recovering it.
CardDesc.Banner of the Darkest Secret: **Recovery**: Players can only recover this from you if there is a card at your site whose suit does not match any of your advisers. _(You can recover it from yourself or the shared bank freely.)_ The new holder must place more `symbol:secret` than old `symbol:secret` here, then takes one `symbol:secret` from the old `symbol:secret` here, and the old holder takes the rest. **Search**: Spend 2 Supply if you're drawing from the world deck _(not the printed cost)_.
CardDesc.Banner of the Mob's Favor: **Recovery**: Put more `symbol:favor` here than old `symbol:favor`. Put old `symbol:favor` in the favor banks, one by one, starting with any suit. Then, flip this banner. **Wake**: You **must** put `symbol:favor` here or move `symbol:favor` here to the favor bank with the least `symbol:favor`. Do this twice. **Search**: When playing to site, you may first discard a denizen card at any card in your region, and you may play to any site in your region.
CardDesc.Banner of the People's Favor: **Recovery**: Put more `symbol:favor` here than old `symbol:favor`. Put old `symbol:favor` in the favor banks, one by one, starting with any suit. **Wake**: You **must** put `symbol:favor` here or move `symbol:favor` here to the favor bank with the least `symbol:favor`. Then, if this banner has 6+ `symbol:favor`, flip it. **Search**: When playing to site, you may first discard a denizen card at any card in your region, and you may play to any site in your region.
CardDesc.Oathkeeper of Devotion: Oathkeeper of Devotion holds the Darkest Secret. Successor to the Chancellor holds the Grand Scepter.
CardDesc.Oathkeeper of Protection: Oathkeeper of Protection holds the most relics and banners. Successor to the Chancellor holds the People's Favor.
CardDesc.Oathkeeper of Supremacy: Oathkeeper of Supremacy rules the most sites. Successor to the Chancellor holds more relics and banners.
CardDesc.Oathkeeper of the People: Oathkeeper of the People holds the People's Favor. Successor to the Chancellor holds the Darkest Secret.
CardDesc.Brutal: If you're the attacker, the defeated player _(even you)_ **must** kill all warbands in their force.
CardDesc.Careless: You gain one more `symbol:favor` _(even when trading for `symbol:secret`)_. You **must** gain one less `symbol:secret` when trading for `symbol:secret`.
CardDesc.Decadent: Spend no Supply if you're traveling to a site in the Cradle from a site in the Provinces or Hinterland. If you're traveling to a site in the Hinterland, increase the Travel cost by 1 Supply.
CardDesc.Greedy: Draw two more cards. _(Stop after a Vision as normal.)_ You **cannot** search if you would spend more than 2 Supply.
